CustomField.description: Country where the candidate resides. Default to "United States" if not specified. No validation required - just capture the information provided. Example: "United States", "Canada", "Mexico".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the country where the candidate resides (e.g., "United States", "Canada", "Mexico"). Defaults to "United States" if not specified. This is part of the complete address for mailing purposes.
CustomField.label: Country
